    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%a%N%f%N%d%N%b%N%h %s %e %r%N%%T %z%N%c%N" }

    AmPmMarkers { 
            "AM",
            "PM",
    }
    CountryISBNNumber { "840" }
    CountryNumber { "840" }
    CurrencyElements { 
            "$",
            "USD ",
            ".",
    }
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "hh:mm:ss aa",
            "hh:mm:ss aa",
            "hh:mm:ss aa",
            "hh:mm:ss aa",
            "EEE dd MMM yyyy  z",
            "EEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss aa z",
            "MMMM/dd/yyyy",
            "MMMM/dd/yyyy",
            "{1} {0}",
    }

            "Sun",
            "Mon",
            "Tue",
            "Wed",
            "Thu",
            "Fri",
            "Sat",
    }

            "Sunday",
            "Monday",

            "Saturday",
    }

        Title { "English locale for the USA" }
        Source { "Free Software Foundation, Inc." }
        Address { "59 Temple Place - Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307, USA" }
        Contact { "" }

        Territory { "USA" }

        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }

        Date { "2000-06-24" }
    }

    Measurement { "American" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[yY].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }

            "Jan",

        LongSalutationMrs { "" }

            "%",
            "0",
            "#",

    }
